OPENCTI_URL.description: The base URL of the OpenCTI instance.

OPENCTI_TOKEN.description: The API token to connect to OpenCTI.

CONNECTOR_ID.description: A unique UUIDv4 identifier for this connector.

CONNECTOR_LOG_LEVEL.description: The minimum level of logs to display.

CONNECTOR_DURATION_PERIOD.description: The period of time to await between two runs of the connector.

OBSTRACTS_BASE_URL.description: The base URL for the Obstracts API.

OBSTRACTS_FEED_IDS.description: Optional. A list of Obstracts feed IDs to ingest. If empty, posts will be ingested from all feeds your team is subscribed to in Obstracts.

OBSTRACTS_INTERVAL_HOURS.description: Polling interval in hours. The connector polls Obstracts for new posts in your subscriptions at this interval. The minimum (and recommended) value is 1.

OBSTRACTS_DAYS_TO_BACKFILL.description: Number of days of historical data to import (maximum: 365). This setting only applies during the initial data polling (backfill). Changing it after the backfill has completed has no effect.
